originalText.text: Webster dictionary defines perfect as being entirely without fault or defect. This is Dr.Rabito personified. This doctor is truly exceptional! From the moment I entered the doors to the office, I felt welcomed, cared for, and completely at ease. Dr. Rabito has gone above and beyond to be sure that my complete health and wellness have been made first priority. He is extremely knowledgeable and personable. I never was made to wait. And if ever I needed to contact him or his staff, they were super speedy in responding by my inquiries. The office is inviting, and his beautiful staff members are friendly and helpful in every way. I feel very comfortable in his care and would recommend him to anyone who needs a great doctor.

originalText.text: I can not thank Dr. Rabito enough, with his help and care I was able to get my old self back. From the first visit I had with him I was comfortable and confident with his plan for my future health. I was able to loose a ton of weight and reverse my blood work, which added years to my life. He truly is a fantastic doctor.

He truly is a fantastic doctor.

originalText.text: Dr. Rabito is an attentive, committed clinician. I can’t thank him enough for his outstanding care and the way he has changed my life for the better. I came to him struggling with weight loss. I was 41 years old, had ongoing thyroid issues, two young children and not a whole lot of time or bandwidth. Dr. Rabito was patient and knowledgeable, demonstrating a deep understanding of my lifestyle, my challenges and my capabilities. He worked with me to set up a long term plan that helped me lose 20 pounds and has me feeling like a new person, mentally and physically. His whole staff is wonderful. I was always treated like a priority.  I have never waited to be seen or to get a call back. His office manager, Rina, is so quick to respond and the sweetest. I highly recommend Dr Rabito!

originalText.text: Dr. Rabito has provided me with outstanding medical care over the past 10 months. He immediately diagnosed what my issues were and treated them effectively, such that I was feeling much better within days of my first visit. Since that time, he has focused on optimizing my health and the results have been excellent. I could not recommend him more highly.

originalText.text:
Dr. Rabito is a wonderful, amazing, and caring doctor. He was recommended to me at a time when my health was not well, my A1C was spiraling out of control, and I was feeling low. I did not know what to expect, but from my first visit to my most recent one, he has been nothing but encouraging and amazing as he patiently explained every one of the medications I was taking as well as answering all of my questions no matter what they were.

Through his expert guidance, I am now off of some of those medications and I refuse to look back! I can't thank him enough because I never imagined I could lose weight, much less without surgery! Now my A1C is the lowest it has ever been, I have lost over 70 pounds, and my blood pressure has finally gone down!

I am extremely thankful for Dr. Rabito's caring nature, knowledge, and guidance in my journey, and also his friendly and helpful staff in making sure I get appointments when I need them! They are all truly the best!
